channel.title: Hardware Troubleshooting Feed
channel.description: Curated fixes and guidance for common hardware issues based on human testimonials, reviews, and crowd-sourced expertise.

item.title: Acme Laptop Pro 15 overheating under light load
item.description: The Acme Laptop Pro 15 overheats under light load. Proposed fixes: clean the fans to remove dust, update BIOS firmware, and undervolt the CPU using available software.
